subtitle: in varios tractatus distincti, ad diversorum & vetustissimorum codicum collationem, ingenti cura denuò typis vulgati.
title: Henrici de Bracton De legibvs et consuetudinibus Angliæ libri qvinqve
by_statement: Quorum quid cuique insit, proxima pagina demonstrabit.
publishers: Typis Milonis Flesher & Roberti Young, assign: Johannis More, armig.

notes.value:
Numbering of leaves irregular; 49 repeated, 50 omitted, 53 numbered 94, 173-174 omitted, 280 numbered 270, 299 numbered 309, 362 numbered 360, and 439 numbered 437.
Initials; printers' ornaments.
"The first printed edition of the entire work was published by Richard Tottell in 1569 (fol.), with a preface by one T. N. (whose identity has never been determined), in which credit is taken for a careful recension of the text.  The next edition (4to) appeared in 1640, being a mere reprint of that of 1569."--DNB.
